Title: Autumn Leaves
Writer: Jean Rouverol, Hugo Butler, Lewis Meltzer, Robert Blees, Jack Jevne (front for Jean Rouverol and Hugo Butler)
Actors: Joan Crawford, Cliff Robertson, Vera Miles, Lorne Greene
Plot: Millicent Wetherby is a middle-aged woman whose life is devoid of love and affection. Millicent's solitary existence changes when she encounters Burt Hansen a charismatic younger man. As Burt successfully woos her and wins her hand in marriage, rumors begin to surface that Millicent's newfound beau is in fact a deranged maniac. Things grow even more complicated for Millicent when a woman claiming to be Hansen's first wife shows up. As Burt begins to lose control of himself, Millicent ponders the most radical of actions against her husband.
